name: Pay It Off! The Game
description:
You Will Get More Done When You Gamify Your Life!

"Gamification works by rewarding completion of tasks with something more concrete. Whether it's treating yourself to a personal reward, or upgrading an online gaming character, almost anything can be more rewarding when you gamify your life than just checking an task off a list."

Pay It Off! lets you gamify your life.
Pay It Off! lets you gamify your finances.
Pay It Off! lets you gamify your future, and pay of your house.

As you Pay It Off you will earn badges and always be able to "see" what you are up against. Your debt now has "hit points" and now this is just another bad guy boss for you to defeat.

You will also learn new ways to beat your debt with Pay It Off's daily tips on how to win in one of the greatest games of your life.
